title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 398-10.1 - Requests for fair hearings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 398-10.1 - Requests for fair hearings

State Regulations

An individual or each member of a couple receiving SSP
benefits or SSPNA has the right to request an administrative fair hearing to
appeal an action of this Office pursuant to section
22
of the

Social Services Law and Part 358 of this Title. A request for a fair hearing
must be made within 60 days after the office's determination, action, or
failure to act about which the individual or member of the couple is
complaining. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
398-10.1

New

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
